pageContext.claim: “The fact is that somebody said it on the other side, our opponent said, ‘Whether you like it or not. Trump actually did more as president than he promised during the campaign.’”
pageContext.analysis: Despite his bravado, Trump broke many of his campaign promises. According to our Trump Promise Tracker, Trump kept less than one-third of 60 key promises he announced during the 2016 campaign -- and he broke half of them. With hours left in his term, Trump even reversed his executive order that limited federal administration officials from lobbying the government or working for foreign countries after they leave their posts -- a key promise of his 2016 campaign.
